-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | A "libcurl"-based streaming HTTP client
--   
@package list-t-libcurl
@version 0.3.0.0

module ListT.Libcurl

-- | A monad for sequential execution of "libcurl" operations.
--   
--   To execute multiple requests concurrently you need to run multiple
--   sessions.
data Session a
type Error = CURLE
runSession :: Session a -> IO (Either Error a)
consumeURL :: String -> (ListT IO ByteString -> IO a) -> Session a
instance Functor Session
instance Applicative Session
instance Monad Session
instance MonadIO Session
